game.name: A Pixel Adventure  Vol 2
game.description:
The pixel hero is back with more excitement and fun for you. He thinks that he has not reached his goal completely. Several things coming on his mind have made him realize that he has a lot of journey to complete on the adventure he embarked several years ago. He has just got to know that there are many unique adventures he planned to embark on by the end of the previous chapter. It seems he failed in destroying the Adenocarcinoma monster completely. 
That monster keeps making the damage to the area. You are the only hero who has taken this responsibility to stay strong against him. Join A Pixel Adventure Vol 2 game and get ready to prove the world that you are really a RPG champion! Your major objective is to explore the Castle of the Adenocarcinoma, spot the secret areas as fast as you can and obtain the booty. You will be amazed here to play 40 levels online on a nightmare castle that is full of deadly monsters. 
Play wisely and collect coins to purchase your weapons like armor, potions, and swords from three stores available in this cool html5 platform game! Move your character using the arrow keys, jump with Z, attack with X and slide through C! Good luck to play like a champion and become the biggest adventurer hero! We are delighted to offer more platform games for boys on atmegame.com. No need to download app or software to play our free online games in your device!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game A Pixel Adventure  Vol 2 at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: RIGHT ICONS TO JUMP AND HIT, LEFT TO MOVE
game.webControlKeys: Z,UP ARROW -JUMP L-R ARROWS TO MOVE, X-HIT
